message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take a bit more!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much! You can't have it all!
You're getting desperate, I'll take most of it now!
I'll give you a small concession, but don't think you're getting away with it!
You're running out of time, take what's left!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think I'm going to give up yet!
You're getting desperate, take the crumbs!
I'll give you a small token, but don't think I'm done fighting!
You're almost out of time, take what's left, it's almost nothing!
I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm not giving up yet!
It's now or never, take the last crumbs!
